author: Special Correspondent
text:
First Additional Sessions Judge S. Nallathambi sentenced a youth to seven years imprisonment for murdering his friend under influence of liquor in 2012.

Kishore Das (25) of Kattabomman Veedhi in Veerappanchathiram had fatally hit Samuel Duraisingh (19), a resident of Agathiyar Veedhi, with a log enraged over disturbance caused to his sleep by the latter after consumption of liquor at the house of a common friend Mayakrishnan at Ashoka Nagar.

Cases registered

The Veerappanchathiram police had registered cases under IPC Sections 302 and 307.

The Section 302 was converted to 304 Part I, under which seven years imprisonment was awarded along with fine of Rs. 3,000 by judge.

The conviction under Section 307, entailed five years imprisonment and Rs. 2,000 fine.

Concurrently

Both terms will run concurrently, Additional Public Prosecutor R. Rajagopal said.
title: Youth gets seven-year jail term for murdering friend
